name: carVertical
public_notice: Contract address has changed from 0xda6cb58a0d0c01610a29c5a65c303e13e885887c to 0x50bc2ecc0bfdf5666640048038c1aba7b7525683 . see https://twitter.com/carVertical_com/status/1311257938942668800

description.en: carVertical is a blockchain-based vehicle history registry. First of its kind, carVertical will gather as much information from di erent sources as possible, and put it into the blockchain registry.
